name: crummy krab - mistful crimson morning (Friday Night Funkin') (Scratch Edition) PC Port
name_original: crummy krab - mistful crimson morning (Friday Night Funkin') (Scratch Edition) PC Port
description:
Wow! Right on, this is a "fam made" mod of a  crummy krab - mistful crimson morning on scratch, this is the official windows port made with NW.js, this mod only contains one song and will close after the songs over, this is still in public beta so there will be more updates in the future 

I DO NOT OWN THE ASSETS OF THIS MOD, THAY ARE OWNED BY THERE RIGHT OWNERS, But the PC port is made by me

Scratch Project made by: lolman296

BIG NEWS!! | 11/1/22 2:20 PM

A NEW FOE APPEARS!!! As Turbowarp has stayed that they are discontinuing NW.js's Coding Engine, we have made a much better version of This Great mod with the best top-of-the-line Electron! We will continue making the NW.js version as long that Torbowarp won't remove it, but here's something better, Electrons Engine is better then NW.js, Why? Because no more lag, no more "bugs", and a faster framerate (OVER 240FPS!!!!)

Why don't u just switch from the NW.js version and come over to the best time Electron Engine?
